text: The Alaska Time Zone subtracts nine hours from UTC during standard time (UTC-9) and eight hours during daylight saving time (UTC-8). This time zone is called Alaska Standard Time (AKST) during standard time (Winter) and Alaska Daylight Time (AKDT) during daylight saving time (Summer). Places that are in Alaska Time Zone: United States Most of Alaska France Gambier Islands Category:Time zones in the United States Category:Alaska
title: Alaska Standard Time
